Buffalo.Cheektowaga Northwest, New York: Cheektowaga Northwest was a census-designated place within the northwestern part of the town of Cheektowaga in Erie County, New York during the 1960 United States Census. The population recorded was 52,362. The census area dissolved in 1970, however the census area became part of Cheektowaga CDP in 1980, when the CDP recorded a population of 92,145.
